location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Cross sections of the Ahwar Rapids

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 75 x 510 mm

mods.abstract: This vertical map illustrates three cross-sections of the Ahwar [Ahvaz] Rapids. The cross-sections are labelled 2945, 2860 and 2810. They correspond to reference numbers which can be found on the IOR/L/MIL/17/15/15, f 11.This item is one of three maps located on a larger sheet (folio 12).
